name: Lasers @ C...#
description:
This game is a tech-demo of a puzzle platformer that I created in about a week for Sumo Digital Rising Star. The point of the game is to move things from one place to another using your little avatar in the game world. This means moving yourself, cubes, light and other things to the goal. Good luck!

WASD - Move

E - Pick up

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

LCTRL/TAB - Lock player position

There are no accessibility limitations for this game as I understand. It does not feature controller support yet.

Gameplay trailer/footage? Nah. You'll have to figure out my ridiculously simple puzzles yourself!
